channel.title: Can someone help me with some coding
channel.description:
Hi i need to know how to make a
::starter command
and also a
::food command
and possibly a
::dragon command
If anyone can get these for me even 1 i will make u mod on my server Bulletscape13 (Must post your login name on Moparscape for this to take effect)If u help with 2 or more ill add 150million gp also the Moderator
Thank You, Billy_tal47
p.s. For the advertisment of my server please feel free to go to this link
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,74648.0.html

item.title: Can someone help me with some coding
item.dc:creator: @svenimen_s Melissa T
item.description:
@svenimen_s wrote:

billytal47:

sorry man i was away from the computer a major thank you to you if u come to my server i will gladly make you a moderator and give u some money ty very much

Nah
I got my own server
And im moderator here its my job to help people

  • Svenimen S

item.title: Can someone help me with some coding
item.dc:creator: @svenimen_s Melissa T
item.description:
@svenimen_s wrote:

you know how to add a command ?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 29, 2007, 03:21:06 PM[/size][hr]Anyway here are the codes :

Search for : if (command.equalsIgnoreCase Under the last } Hit “Enter” and paste :

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("food") && playerRights >= #) { addItem(386, 1000); addItem(398, 1000); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("dragon") && playerRights >= #) { addItem(3140, 1); addItem(4087, 1); addItem(1149, 1); addItem(1187, 1); addItem(4151, 1); }

At the # but the player rights

[1] = All players
[2] = Mod only
[3] = Admin only
And there is a tut for starter command

  • Svenimen S[br][size=1]Posted on: January 29, 2007, 03:25:49 PM[/size][hr]You could atleast say ty …

Read full topic
